newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo rubber futures end mixed after range-trade.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo rubber futures end mixed after range-trade.

text.p: Tokyo rubber futures ended mixed on Wednesday after moving within narrow ranges for most of the day, traders said.
Prices ranged from 0.5 yen per kg lower to 0.9 yen higher. Benchmark August was down 0.1 yen at 153.6 yen.

Prices opened lower across the board with bearish sentiment carried over from the previous day, and then cautious sentiment that prices were too low, stimulated moderate short-covering, the traders said. "Activity remained sluggish. The market suffered from a lack of fresh incentives," one trader said.
